  • titan_pylib.data_structures.set.hashed_multiset

titan_pylib.data_structures.set.hashed_multiset のソースコード

 1from typing import Iterator, List, Hashable
 2


[ドキュメント]
 3class HashedMultiset():
 4
 5  def __init__(self, a: List[Hashable]=[]):
 6    d = {}
 7    for e in a:
 8      if e in d:
 9        d[e] += 1
10      else:
11        d[e] = 1
12    self._data = d
13    self._len = len(a)
14


[ドキュメント]
15  def add(self, key: Hashable, val: int=1) -> None:
16    if key in self._data:
17      self._data[key] += val
18    else:
19      self._data[key] = val
20    self._len += val


21


[ドキュメント]
22  def discard(self, key: Hashable, val: int=1) -> None:
23    if key not in self._data: return
24    if self._data[key] > val:
25      self._len -= val
26      self._data[key] -= val
27    else:
28      self._len -= self._data[key]
29      del self._data[key]


30


[ドキュメント]
31  def discard_all(self, key: Hashable) -> None:
32    if key not in self._data: return
33    self._len -= self._data[key]
34    del self._data[key]


35


[ドキュメント]
36  def count(self, key: Hashable) -> int:
37    return self._data.get(key, 0)


38


[ドキュメント]
39  def len_elm(self) -> int:
40    return len(self._data)


41


[ドキュメント]
42  def keys(self) -> Iterator[Hashable]:
43    for k in self._data.keys():
44      yield k


45


[ドキュメント]
46  def values(self) -> Iterator[int]:
47    for v in self._data.values():
48      yield v


49


[ドキュメント]
50  def items(self) -> Iterator[Hashable]:
51    for item in self._data.items():
52      yield item


53


[ドキュメント]
54  def clear(self) -> None:
55    self._data = {}
56    self._len = 0
57    self._len_elm = 0


58
59  def __eq__(self, other):
60    if isinstance(other, HashedMultiset):
61      d = other._data
62    elif hasattr(other, 'items'):
63      d = other
64    else:
65      raise TypeError
66    for k, v in self._data.items():
67      if k not in d or d[k] != v:
68        return False
69    for k, v in d.items():
70      if k not in self._data or self._data[k] != v:
71        return False
72    return True
73
74  def __contains__(self, key: Hashable):
75    return key in self._data
76
77  def __len__(self):
78    return self._len
